sentence: All members shall work properly, ____ and put in effort so that work does not stagnate, ensure timely and accurate information updates.
All members must be incorrupt, protect their own reputation and the ____'s.
All members must comply with all official ____ of the Organisation.
All diplomatic activities with other organisations must be ____.
The organisation must ensure that ____ democracy does not occur.
Units shall not stop working on holidays unless permitted by organisational ____.
The official demonym is ____.
Expanding democracy goes hand in hand with enforcement discipline, rule of law, and ____ for differences.
Ghost administrative division is an administrative division not being occupied for at least 1 ____.
A landslide victory is a victory with ____ percentage or more of all the votes.
The General Secretary has the final authority over every official document, ____ adopted by the Semblæ.
No nondisclosure documents are allowed, except the ____'s.
Members of The Secretariats must be born in the territory of the ____ Republic of Vietnam.
The ____ has the right to hold inter-organisational elections.
The House shall only hold an election session when it's approved by members of the House (who are citizens of The ____) using the MAJ voting method.
____ members are subject to inspection and supervision by the organisation.
The levels performing inspection and supervision tasks must ____ with official documents and direct instructions from the organisation.
Each province needs at least ____ people to remain in existence.
One person can only be a citizen of ____ province.
In the event that a province has a population of one, at least one additional individual must join within ten days for the province to remain in ____.
Official documents may or may not include the names of the branches or divisions of the ____.
____ on Discord is automatically considered a member of the organisation.
All Discord accounts except APPs are eligible to ____.
It is prohibited to persuade others to follow a ____ in any form.
When the General Secretary or General Secretary 2 has a surgery, no one will have the position nor its power ____ a new notification is issued.
Face-to-face meetings for businesses are prohibited when a ____ occurs in that place.
The Semblæ has the right to lift a ban on "face-to-face meetings for businesses" if it reaches a two-____ approval vote.
The ____ is adopted indefinitely unless the General Secretary wants to stop using it.
Every ____ of holding any positions in the organisation is voted in the Semblæ.
____ social security program has a deadline, output standards, and impact index; must be publicly evaluated and consulted with beneficiaries.
"Charteral crisis" is when the General Secretary defies the ____ Court's ruling.
The organisation ____ every gender.
The organisation can only organise ____ Day by Semblæ Election.
Passed documents will take effect ____ after being passed unless stated otherwise.
Every referendum must last from ____ to 14 days.
On Discord, ____ agencies are only permitted to post information in the "news" channel.
"Information" and "Declaration of the State of Emergency" documents are ____ by the General Secretary 2 after five days.
All documents shall be composed ____.
The Secretariats has the final say on determining what represents the entire organisation and ____.

If the organisation's first General Secretary ____ away without transferring power or making a decision, and The Secretariats fails to reach a consensus of at least 2 out of 3 discussion rounds, each lasting 3 to 7 days, the organisation shall be dissolved.
Do not ____ or distort information related to the organisation.
Only organise town halls on mentimeter.com, and at max ____ per month.
All Semblæ ____ are allowed to organise town halls.
Units that have ____ representation in the Semblæ will be voted to be allowed to organise town halls in the Semblæ separately.
Sexual relations with ____ are prohibited.
When a person has sexual relations with animals, their actions shall be spread ____.
Only images ____ to public decency shall be used in discussions within the organisation's official workplaces.
The ____ of sexually explicit language in chatting is permitted, unless Memorial Day is enacted.
The act of passing laws regarding narcotics is ____.
Pardons shall only be individually and carried out by a vote of the ____.
Agencies, organisations, individuals can ____ support the Militia through material, financial, and morale contributions.
The creation of literary and artistic works are ____ supported.
Proposals for ____ in all aspects of the organisation shall be encouraged.
The organisation ____ game piracy.
Any intellectual properties are welcomed to be shared to the organisation, preferably ____.
Prioritise models that can be replicated quickly, at ____ costs, have a great impact on life, and bring practical benefits to people.
The establishment, membership, or funding of armed organisations without ____ from The Secretariats is prohibited.
Conducting warfare using sexually explicit images is ____.
Conducting warfare involving bloody media is ____.
The establishment of ____ is prohibited.
All disputes should first be resolved through ____ negotiation and dialogue.
Martial law is ____.
The manipulation of any ____ agency is prohibited and vice versa.
News agencies must register their names with the General Secretary ____ publishing information.
The bots "Mimu", "UnbelievaBoat", "Bankify" and ____ on Discord constitute the economy of the organisation.
Everyone, whether a member of the organisation or not, is ____ to participate in the organisation's economy.
Bidding in any form ____ than direct appointment is prohibited.
All books are ____ to be circulated.
Monopolies are ____.
The Treasury shall only issue bonds paid by TPO's ____ currencies, and the interest rate must be at least 0.2% per year.
The General Secretary 2 is responsible for training and issuing ____ to auction practitioners.
When multiple assets are auctioned simultaneously, those assets must be identical and share the same starting ____.
The actual starting price for an auction shall be the starting price of one asset ____ by the number of assets.
Auctioning of assets sold in stores managed by the ____ is prohibited.
When a person has admitted to being a witness and has taken an oath but then refuses to testify, they shall be ____.
The Court does not accept submitting or withdrawing lawsuit petition documents on Sundays and ____ New Year holidays.
SimBraille is the official font for documents written in ____.
Everyone ____ be in a province to be properly represented in the government
